document.full_text: a judge sentenced gregory paul hess to 60 months in state prison for robbing a shell station in february with a pellet gun and good manners.
document.title: 'polite robber' is given a 60-month sentence in gas station holdup
lines_and_colors: a judge sentenced gregory paul hess to 60 months in state prison for robbing a shell station in february with a pellet gun and good manners.
